Header 1
  Subitem 1
  Subitem 2
    Sub-subitem 1
    Sub-subitem 2
  Subitem 3
Header 2
  Another item
  More content
    Nested item 1
    Nested item 2
      Deep nested item
      Another deep item
  Final subitem
Header 3
  Section content
  Additional data
    More nested content
    Extended information
      Very deep nesting
      Deep content example
    Back to normal nesting
  End of section
